crw_board_crw_planning.jql: project in (CRW) ORDER BY Rank ASC

crw_board_buildnext.jql: project in (CRW) AND component in ('productization: build & internals') AND resolution is null ORDER BY Rank ASC

crw_cdwtriage.description: Issues are New and have no target release set
crw_cdwtriage.jql: project = CRW AND status = Open AND fixversion is EMPTY

crw_lint_illegalfixversion.jql: project = CRW AND (fixVersion in ( %(crw_bucket_versions)s ) OR fixVersion is EMPTY) AND resolution = done

crw_lint_nocomponent.jql: project in (CRW) and component is EMPTY AND resolution is EMPTY

crw_lint_unresolved_in_release.description: Unresolved issues in already released versions
crw_lint_unresolved_in_release.jql: project in (CRW) and fixVersion in releasedVersions() and resolution is empty

crw_mystuff.description: Issues assigned to current user or in a component lead by current user.

crw_needpmack.description: Product manager have not yet approved a jira with a target release
crw_needpmack.jql: 'Target Release' is not EMPTY AND 'CDW pm_ack' = '?' AND resolution = Unresolved

crw_respin.description: Issues included in a respin (has label containing 'respin-[a-k]')
